name: Dragon Venture
description:
The controls are fairly comparable to those of the other games we've played thus far. The arrow keys, to move to the left and right, space to jump, and double space to jump higher, respectively. 

The player controls the dragon as it moves through a variety of obstacles. If the dragon comes into contact with any of these, and you lose all your lives, the game ends and you have to start over. There are a total of 4 levels each of them has its own unique layout, challenges, timer, and coin placement. 

Except for the first level, there is a door at the beginning of each level through which you can return to the previous level, and a door at the end of each level allows you to jump to the next level.

By pressing the "Escape" button, the game can be paused, and it can be resumed by pressing it again.
